sentences.en: a media campaign to represent Democrats as angry partisans
sentences.cn: 把民主党人描述成愤怒的死硬派的媒体宣传

sentences.en: And it will blur the existing partisan divide on the issue between conservatives and liberals.
sentences.cn: 其次是它将模糊现存于保守人士和自由主义者之间对此问题的分水岭.

sentences.en: At first she was against Pen, and suspicious of him , she was his partisan now.
sentences.cn: 起先她反对小潘, 怀疑他不怀好意, 现在却跟他很投契.
英国报纸的立场壁垒分明。

sentences.en: But in febrile, partisan Washington that is a pipe - dream.
sentences.cn: 但是在狂热 、 盲从的华盛顿,这只是一种妄想.

sentences.en: He is clearly too partisan to be a referee.
sentences.cn: 他倾向性过于明显，当不了裁判。
大多数报纸都有政治倾向。
大多数报纸都是有政治倾向的.

sentences.en: Officers in Chiang Kai - shek's army were not entirely unaware of the perils of partisan warfare.
sentences.cn: 蒋介石的军官们并非完全不懂得游击战的危险性.

sentences.en: Partisan posturing , debt and financial gambling : no way to run the world's eighth - largest economy.
sentences.cn: 加州预算项目的金. 罗斯 如是说.

sentences.en: R : It's not my lucky day, is it? A partisan, then.
sentences.cn: 今天不是我的幸运日, 对 么 ?那就古戟吧.

sentences.en: Since the fight will be held in Puerto Rico, are you worried for a partisan verdict?
sentences.cn: 既然比赛将在波多黎各举行, 你对评分裁判的作用表示担心 吗 ?

sentences.en: The audience was very partisan, and refused to listen to the points she was making in her speech.
sentences.cn: 观众们很有偏见, 拒绝聆听她发言中的要点.

sentences.en: Used when a politician needs to appear statesmanlike and non - partisan.
sentences.cn: 政治家想要显得特别重要、特别有风度的时候酷爱此词.

sentences.en: You must listen to both points of view and try not to be partisan.
sentences.cn: 你必须兼听双方观点,尽量做到不偏不倚.

sentences.en: You must listen to both points of view and try not to is partisan.
sentences.cn: 你必须兼听双方观点,尽量做到不偏不倚.

words.tran_cn: 党派性；党派偏见；对党派的忠诚
党派的；效忠的；偏袒的；盲目推崇的

trans.tran_cn: 党派性的，偏袒的，游击队的
trans.tran_en: strongly supporting a particular political party, plan or leader, usually without considering the other choices carefully

trans.tran_cn: 党羽，强硬支持者，游击队员，戟的一种
trans.tran_en: a member of an armed group that fights against an enemy that has taken control of its country
